items.name: Ancient Glimmer
explicitMods: 2% chance to receive additional Blight items when opening a Reward Chest in a Heist
3% chance to receive additional Breach items when opening a Reward Chest in a Heist
4% increased Quantity of Items dropped in Heists
10% increased Rarity of Items dropped in Heists
items.descrText: You must find the sculpture The Catch in a Smuggler's Den or Underbelly Blueprint to be able to equip this
